full_summary:
**Underground Water and Sewer Materials (W6854-240335)**

A request for a Standing Offer for Underground Water and Sewer Materials (W6854-240335) - PSIB Stream is being issued.

**Contract Summary**

* **Reference Number**: WS4534804840-Doc4534888094
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4534804840
* **Publication Date**: April 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 30, 2024 at 14:00 EST (please note that bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive).
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 31, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2025

**Scope of Work**

The contractor will supply and deliver underground water and sewer components including, but not limited to, ductile and cast iron pipes, valves, hydrants, and municipal casting, listed in the most current Ontario edition of the Allpriser Blue Book for Watermain and Sewer Products. The work will be carried out on an as-and-when-requested basis to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden. The standing offer period will be one year with an option to extend for an additional one-year period.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is open to businesses that meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery**

The goods will be delivered to Ontario (except for the National Capital Region).

**Casting Institutions**

This tender is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the goods will be used by the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Contact Information**

Sabrina Cheng, SPAC/PSPC, can be contacted at [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for further information.
